und.value:
Take the work out of workshop as you attend this one from the comfort of your home or office. http://geochange.er.usgs.gov/sw and a click of the mouse get you into the web workshop on "The Impacts of Climate and Land Use Change in the Southwestern U.S."

This interactive web workshop, hosted by the U.S. Geological Survey, is designed to provide background information and stimulate discussion on the effects of climate and land-use changes in the rapidly growing southwestern U.S. Participants will be able to read and contribute to discussions on prepared position papers and volunteered contributions, and obtain lists of references, as well as links to related data sets.
